definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Look for non-verbal signals when trying to determine whether someone is interested in you.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定对方否对你有意时，留意非语言性的讯号。

sentences.english: The railway is undergoing signal improvement and train refurbishment works.
sentences.chinese: 东铁正进行改善讯号系统和列车翻新工程。

sentences.english: RP3 on sampling signal panel is secondary sampling signal adjusted potentiometer.
sentences.chinese: 取样信号板上RP3为二次电流取样讯号调整电位器。

sentences.english: A receiver demodulates the carrier signal that arrives from its antenna.
sentences.chinese: 接收器解调变到达它的天线的载波讯号。

sentences.english: Each of the satelite is contantly sending out the signals.
sentences.chinese: 每个卫星都能单独发射讯号。

sentences.english: HASI will make similar measurements using radar signals.
sentences.chinese: HASI也会运用雷达讯号进行类似的量测。

sentences.english: What are the chemicals in pheromones?
sentences.chinese: 到底费洛蒙有什么化学讯号在里面？

sentences.english: Coaxial cable is widely used in urban areas to distribute television signals.
sentences.chinese: 同轴缆线广泛的用于都会地区以分配电视的讯号。

sentences.english: The 1.5mm board-to-board distance makes these connectors ideal for limited space applications.
sentences.chinese: 并在这狭窄空间做大量讯号的完美连接。

sentences.english: In order to elucidate the relationship between root chemical signals and the quality of rice.
sentences.chinese: 目的试图阐明水稻根系化学讯号与米质形成的关系。

sentences.english: Cable testing instruments measure crosstalk by applying a test signal to one wire pair.
sentences.chinese: 缆线测试仪器以加上测试讯号到一对线来测量串音。

sentences.english: Indoor TV signal amplifier. Better signal, better picture.
sentences.chinese: 改善天线接收讯号，令电视昼面更清析。

sentences.english: The level of false signals has to be measured and deducted from the data.
sentences.chinese: 必须先测定错误讯号的强度，然后从数据里扣掉。

sentences.english: For demodulator, we utilize a delay line (DI) to transform the phase signal to intensity signal.
sentences.chinese: 在解调变的元件，使用一延迟器，來解调回强度讯号。

sentences.english: But a series of tests showed Ms Yang something was abnormal.
sentences.chinese: 但是经过一系列检测后，杨女士发现一个异常讯号。

sentences.english: It also displays the battery level and network signal strength.
sentences.chinese: 同时它还能显示出电池电量和网络讯号强度。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
